commit message:

Solution from stack overflow:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15162821/why-does-removeongloballayoutlistener-throw-a-nosuchmethoderror/15162928#15162928
Prevent NPE in onRestart of offlineguides
Make sure drawable exists before resizing

Merge pull request #227 from iFixit/v2.5-fixes

V2.5 fixes

Merge branch 'master' into guide-comments-new

Conflicts:
App/res/values/ids.xml
App/res/values/strings.xml
App/src/com/dozuki/ifixit/ui/guide/view/GuideViewActivity.java
Fix merge conflict errors
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into category-hierarchy--respect-display-order

Merge category-hierarchy--respect-display-order (#223) into master

Category hierarchy: Respect display order

Because of the inherently unordered nature of JSON objects, we couldn't
respect the display order of the category hierarchy. This switches the
hierarchy response to a new endpoint that uses arrays to specify the
order of the children. This removes the need to perform a
lexicographical sort on the children before displaying them in the list.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into guide-comments-new
Comments: Check for updated comments on CommentActivity load
CommentsActivity: Remove debug log
Comments: add long press text hint on comments menu item
Comments: Add exit reply button and add comment progress spinner
Comments: make comment links clickable
Comments: default progress to hidden and menu to visible
Comments: hide reply cancel button after exiting
Comments: Fix onCancelLogin disabled comment field bug
Comments: hide scrollindicator
Comments: Enable reply on replies, which replies to the parent
Comments: show suggestions on edittext
Comments: pass along deleted commentid to ApiCall

Merge pull request #190 from iFixit/guide-comments-new

Add commenting to Guides / Steps
Comments: Show loading indicator on edit save
BaseActivity: Finish activity if custom view pressed
Comments: call up to general viewComments
Comments: make sure comment field exists before get-ing
Comments: add analytics events for actions
Comments: make DateFormat object static final to prevent allocating new object everytime

Comments: remove bad looking default avatar image

Because a gray background is better than a poor default image.

Custom logo: Improve click action handling

Rather than have BaseMenuDrawerActivity poke into the view that
BaseActivity inflates for custom logos, use a method to let subclasses
override the default behavior.
CommentsActivity: Remove trailing whitespace
Comment avatar: Add size to ImageSizes

Image: Simplify getPath()

This removes some unnecessary code from `Image.getPath()`.

- Adding `.` before the size isn't needed because the size should come
from ImageSizes which will always be formatted correctly..
- The offline flag wasn't used except for one place which is simplified
by using `PicassoUtils.displayImage()`.

AlertDialogs: Remove useless calls to `create()`

`AlertDialog.Builder.show()` is equivalent to
`AlertDialogBuilder.create().show()` so the extra call to `create()` can
be removed.

CommentsActivity: Remove constructor

Constructors for Activities are weird... lets move that initialization
to the field declaration.

CommentsActivity: Use `this` over `getBaseContext`

Turns out `getBaseContext()` shouldn't really be used ever according to
various stack overflow posts.

GuideView: Default to super.onActivityResult()

Otherwise lots of strange bugs could crop up with `BaseActivity` not
receiving activity results in GuideViewActivity.
GuideViewActivity: Remove unused method

GuideView: Make menu invalidation clearer

Invalidating the menu is used for a lot more than just updating comment
counts. This makes the reasoning behind calling it much more clear.

Comments API call: Return null on JSON error

The chance of this happening is exceptionally low and logging it won't
help anything. Just return null and have it fail hard at the caller.
ApiEndpoint: Make indentation consistent
Comments: fix menu items on pre honeycomb comments

Comments: add left/right margin to list items

So that comments fit better on tablets and larger devices
Remove configChanges catch from activity, was causing problems
Comments: trim off whitespace
Comments: Save replying state on orientation change
Bump version # for release
